document_data.caption: A map of Corwell in southern Gwynneth.
document_data.name: Corwell
document_data.mainbody: '''Corwell''' was a kingdom on the isle of [[Gwynneth]] within the [[Moonshae Isles]].
document_data.Geography: Corwell was located in southern Gwynneth. Its northern borders were marked by [[the Highlands]] and [[Cambro Mountains]], both of which formed a rocky boundary between the northern half of the island. Much of Corwell was covered by the [[Llyrath Forest]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}{{Cite dungeon/196/Backdrop: The Moonshae Isles}} The eastern arm of Corwell included the land between the Cambro Mountains and the [[Strait of Alaron]] up to the settlement of [[Thorndyke]].
document_data.History: Corwell was the first and oldest kingdom of the [[Ffolk]] within the Moonshaes Isles. It was founded by a Ffolk hero named [[Cymrych Hugh]], who later became the first High King and moved his capital to [[Callidyrr]].
